<details>
          <summary>MCP tool call</summary>
      
*Called tool*: playwright-mcp-server - playwright_evaluate: Execute JavaScript in the browser console

*Parameters*:
  * script: (() => {
  function findElementByText(root, text) {
    const walker = document.createTreeWalker(root, NodeFilter.SHOW_ELEMENT, null);
    let node;
    const targetText = text.toLowerCase();
    while ((node = walker.nextNode())) {
      if ((node.innerText || '').toLowerCase().includes(targetText)) {
        return node;
      }
    }
    return null;
  }
  const el = findElementByText(document.body, 'JUGAR AN√ìNIMAMENTE') || findElementByText(document.body, 'JUGAR ANONIMAMENTE');
  if (!el) return { found: false };
  const cs = window.getComputedStyle(el);
  return {
    found: true,
    tag: el.tagName,
    text: el.innerText.trim().slice(0, 200),
    color: cs.color,
    backgroundColor: cs.backgroundColor,
    borderColor: cs.borderColor
  };
})()

    while ((node = walker.nextNode())) {

    return null;

<details>
          <summary>MCP tool call</summary>
      
*Called tool*: playwright-mcp-server - playwright_evaluate: Execute JavaScript in the browser console

*Parameters*:
  * script: (() => {
  function findButton() {
    const candidates = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button, a, .login-btn, .btn'));
    const targetTexts = ['JUGAR AN√ìNIMAMENTE', 'JUGAR ANONIMAMENTE'];
    for (const el of candidates) {
      const text = (el.innerText || '').trim().toUpperCase();
      if (targetTexts.some(t => text.includes(t))) return el;
    }
    const walker = document.createTreeWalker(document.body, NodeFilter.SHOW_ELEMENT, null);
    let node;
    while ((node = walker.nextNode())) {
      const text = (node.innerText || '').trim().toUpperCase();
      if (targetTexts.some(t => text.includes(t))) return node;
    }
    return null;
  }
  const el = findButton();
  if (!el) return { found: false };
  const cs = getComputedStyle(el);
  const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
  return {
    found: true,
    tag: el.tagName,
    id: el.id || null,
    classList: Array.from(el.classList),
    text: (el.innerText || '').trim(),
    color: cs.color,
    backgroundColor: cs.backgroundColor,
    backgroundImage: cs.backgroundImage,
    borderColor: cs.borderColor,
    rect: { x: rect.x, y: rect.y, width: rect.width, height: rect.height }
  };
})()

*Result*:
Executed JavaScript:

*Result*:
(() => {
  function findButton() {
    const candidates = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button, a, .login-btn, .btn'));
    const targetTexts = ['JUGAR AN√ìNIMAMENTE', 'JUGAR ANONIMAMENTE'];
    for (const el of candidates) {
      const text = (el.innerText || '').trim().toUpperCase();
      if (targetTexts.some(t => text.includes(t))) return el;
    }
    const walker = document.createTreeWalker(document.body, NodeFilter.SHOW_ELEMENT, null);
    let node;
    while ((node = walker.nextNode())) {
      const text = (node.innerText || '').trim().toUpperCase();
      if (targetTexts.some(t => text.includes(t))) return node;
    }
    return null;
  }
  const el = findButton();
  if (!el) return { found: false };
  const cs = getComputedStyle(el);
  const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
  return {
    found: true,
    tag: el.tagName,
    id: el.id || null,
    classList: Array.from(el.classList),
    text: (el.innerText || '').trim(),
    color: cs.color,
    backgroundColor: cs.backgroundColor,
    backgroundImage: cs.backgroundImage,
    borderColor: cs.borderColor,
    rect: { x: rect.x, y: rect.y, width: rect.width, height: rect.height }
  };
})()
